```{r}
v <- 1:10
```


```{r}
odd <- function(v) {
  v[v %% 2 == 1]
}
odd(11:2)
```

```{r}
v <- 1:10
iOdd <- v %% 2 == 1
v[iOdd] <- -v[iOdd]
v[iOdd]
```

```{r}
v <- c(1,2,77,4,-1,4,5,-3)
min(v)
```

```{r}
min <- Inf 
for (n in v) {
  cat(n, "\n")
}
```

```{r}
min <- Inf 
for (n in v) {
  cat(n, " ")
  if(n < min) {
    min <- n
    cat("new min is", n)
  }
  cat("\n")
}
min


```

```{r}
for(i in 1:(length(v) - 1)) {
  if (v[i+1 > v[i]]) {
    cat(i, "next larger")
  }
}
```
